ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: BERD - Sous-projet relatif à l'eau de Hatay
EBWO - Deelproject voor water in Hatay
BERD - Subprojeto relativo ao setor da água de Hatay
EBRD - Delprojekt avseende vatten i Hatay
EBOR - Dílčí vodohospodářský projekt v provincii Hatay
EBOR - Podprojekt dotyczący gospodarki wodnej w prowincji Hatay
EBOR - Odprojekt za vodo v Hatayu
ЕБВР - Подпроект за водоснабдяване на Хатай
BERD - Sub-proiect în domeniul apei în Hatay
EBRD - Potprojekt u području voda u Hataju

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ADDRESS: Aksaray Mahallesi, Mehmet Kafadar Cd. No:22

OLD.P: — Construction of 140 km waste water collection network in Arsuz District — Hatay.
— The replacement of 260 km water supply network in Dortyol district — Hatay.
— The replacement of 200 km water supply network in Samandagi District — Hatay.
— Supervision for implementation of construction contracts to support the above listed 3 projects.

NEW.P: — Construction of 240 km wastewater collection network in Arsuz District — Hatay,
— The replacement of 200 km water supply network in Samandagi District — Hatay,
— Supervision for implementation of construction contracts to support the above listed 2 projects above.
